Package main

Class Game

java.lang.Object
main.Game
public class Game extends Object
This class stores overall game objects/variables and methods that change the game state
Since:
12-04-2022

    • Game

      public Game(Player given_player, int numDays, int diff)
      Sets player, number of days and difficulty
      Parameters:
      given_player - player that is playing the game
      numDays - number of days the player wants to play for
      diff - how diffiuclt the player wants their game to be
